Name: The Yellow Rose Duo
Description:
Brighten someone’s day with Moonpig Plants. With high quality plants for all occasions, you can create a memorable moment of pure loveliness in the comfort of their own home.

Introduction
Get ready to pop on your sunnies, because these bright and beautiful yellow roses add a splash of sunshine to anyone's porch or garden. It contains two yellow rose plants settled in a zinc metal planter. Just the thing for banishing those winter blues.

What’s in the Box?

2 x 10.5cm Yellow Rose
1 x BlueMetal Zinc Trug 

Approx. height 20cm

The Important Part: 

  • We promise five days’ freshness or a free replacement with every plant.
  • Select your date or get next day delivery when you order by 9pm Monday-Friday. Plus, get SMS tracking and a 2 hour delivery window.
  • Our plants arrive in bud and will come into bloom within a day or two. This means fresher flowers for longer – yay!

Please Note:

  • In the rare event that any plants become unavailable or are not quite up to standard, we’ll replace them with flowers of similar or superior style, quality and value.
